feed.title: Ramblings Of An Sentience Going Insanely Awesome

entry.title: Bjork In Adventure Time
entry.content:
Dude, what the Bjork?!

Finn The Human

I’m gonna embarrass the Bjork out of you!

Jake The Dog

entry.title: Teaching Milan To Program
entry.content:
core concepts

  • variables
  • logic
  • conditionals
  • loops

setup

  • program in a browser (https://www.codebox.io)
  • terminal
  • directory
  • editor (sublime text)

python

turtle graphics

  • via http://stackoverflow.com/a/587826/5549
  • mess around / experiment
  • loops
  • conditionals

pygame and browser programming

  • http://inventwithpython.com/chapters/
  • http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/ehmatthes/intro_programming/blob/master/notebooks/index.ipynb
  • http://pythontutor.com/

Javascript

  • camera API; motion interface; kinect / wii game
  • js programming setup; online ide
  • sprites that can move
  • communication / chat
  • backgrounds / environment

Milan’s Game Idea

Name: TODO

Description

Set in Cartoon Network and Disney Land: all the villains from all the TV shows have escaped into other shows (kind of like Wreck It Ralph, but with Cartoon Network and Disney characters)

Game Play

Travel through time and stop the villains from invading the whole world. Once they’ve conquered the TV world, they will have access to the real world. The only way to stop them is to team up with (all) the characters from different shows.

Control your character with the arrow keys or the mouse. Talk to other players (voice and text) Form teams with other players

Suit up: store that you can buy upgrades and items from [$$$$$] – weapons – armor – special items

Find clues and codes to travel to different worlds

Characters

Heroes

  • Finn The Human
  • Jake The Dog

Villains

  • The Lich
  • Vilgax
  • Clu

TODO

entry.title: ussd
entry.content: The deeper I get into a USSD tree the more i worry about either computer, network or human malfunctions. Which means I have to start from the beginning.

entry.title: mcdonalds
entry.content: there is something in a mcd cheeseburger, that is in neither of the 4 food groups. Something neither animal or mineral. Fairy dust probably. Or an ancient galactic artifact.

entry.title: thinking funny
entry.content:
“Thinking about our acts? That’s what we do, is take a subject and just don’t leave it along until there’s nothing left of it” – Louis CK, Talking Funny

“I think of a joke as the minimum amount of moves to get to a punchline” – Ricky Gervais, Talking Funny

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OKY6BGcx37k

entry.title: aldous
entry.content:
poetic reply

aldous huxley was a dick his mother called him richard

he wrote a book i thought it good brave new world was right?

so, darling dear i sadly fear your meaning isn’t clear

he seems alright? i mean: brave new world

limerick

aldous huxley was a dick his mother called him richard and when he wasn’t taking drugs he wrote a lot about them

entry.title: politeness
entry.content:
Politeness

Always thank your infobots when they do a good job. And end your messages to anyone with: “Love, Michael”

entry.title: Her Soundtrack
entry.content:
The Moon Song

I’m lying on the moon
My dear, I’ll be there soon
It’s a quiet starry place
Time’s we’re swallowed up
In space we’re here a million miles away

The Moon Song: Karen O

lyrics


Off You

I’ve laid this island sun a thousand times
I’m on it but I’m going strange

This island’s sun I’ve laid a thousand times
Fortune me, fortune me, of all of my mistakes
I think I lent you late, now every sick person
Seemed to come my way

But I’ve never seen the scarlet
Or a riot or the violence of you
I am the autumn in the scarlet
I am the make-up on your eyes

Off You: The Breeders

lyrics

entry.title: mindstorms cns
entry.content: I have the central nervous system of a mindstorms robot plugged into my computer. strong AI to follow.
